metadata.title: CVE-2021-47215 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5e: kTLS, Fix crash in RX resync flowFor the TLS RX resync flow, we maintain a list of TLS contextsthat require some attention, to communicate their resync informationto the HW.Here we fix list corruptions, by protecting the entries againstmovements coming from resync_handle_seq_match(), until their resynchandling in napi is fully completed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
